typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		goods as (customers as string[], orders as (orderId as short, orderTotal as double, shipped as (orderItems as (itemName as string, itemQty as short)[]))[], trade as boolean),
		location as string,
		name as string,
		satellites as string[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	singleDocument: true,
	wildcardPaths:['microsoft.json']) ~> srcdatafile
source(output(
		batters as (batter as (id as short, type as string)[]),
		id as short,
		name as string,
		ppu as double,
		topping as (id as short, type as string)[],
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true,
	wildcardPaths:['OneJSON_Object.json']) ~> SourceJSONFile
source(output(
		batters as (batter as (id as short, type as string)[]),
		id as short,
		name as string,
		ppu as double,
		topping as (id as short, type as string)[],
		type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	singleDocument: true,
	wildcardPaths:['ManyJSON_Objects.json']) ~> SourceJSONFileMany
srcdatafile foldDown(unroll(goods.customers),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		customers = goods.customers
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
srcdatafile foldDown(unroll(goods.orders.shipped.orderItems),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		itemName = goods.orders.shipped.orderItems.itemName,
		itemQty = goods.orders.shipped.orderItems.itemQty,
		location,
		orderId = goods.orders.orderId
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
srcdatafile foldDown(unroll(goods.orders, goods.orders),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		itemName = goods.orders.shipped.orderItems.itemName,
		customers = goods.customers,
		location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten3 foldDown(unroll(itemName),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		itemName,
		customers,
		location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten4
Flatten4 foldDown(mapColumn(
		name,
		itemName,
		customers,
		location
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten5
SourceJSONFile foldDown(unroll(batters.batter, batters.batter),
	mapColumn(
		batterid = batters.batter.id,
		id,
		name,
		ppu,
		topping,
		type,
		battertype = batters.batter.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten6
SourceJSONFile foldDown(unroll(topping),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		ppu,
		topping_id = topping.id,
		type,
		topping_type = topping.type,
		batters
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten7
Flatten7 foldDown(unroll(batters.batter, batters.batter),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		ppu,
		topping_id,
		type,
		topping_type,
		batter_id = batters.batter.id,
		batter_type = batters.batter.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten8
